Ad Text:
About Us.

Oolio/Swiftpos is an Australian owned Point of Sale and payments company that creates bespoke solutions for the Hospitality and Retail industries. We have offices across Australia, the UK and the US and provide a full suite of management systems, to deliver excellent governance and member engagement to thousands of clients worldwide. Our fully integrated business solutions are well known within the stadia space and cater specifically to the sports, leisure, and the food and beverage sectors. For the past thirty years our management systems have underpinned some of the biggest clubs and venues in Australia and around the world. 

We are looking for an experienced AI Developer to join our team and help build cutting-edge image recognition solutions for Point of Sale (POS) environments. Your work will focus on enabling real-time item detection and classification using advanced computer vision models integrated into POS systems. 

Your Key Responsibilities will be to;

Design, train, and optimize object detection models for retail environments. 

Implement and deploy lightweight AI models for edge devices and web-based applications. 

Integrate AI pipelines with POS systems for seamless user experience. 

Collaborate with product and engineering teams to ensure scalability and performance. 

In this role you will be working alongside a diverse team of developers on new versions of our customized and bespoke products. You will have the opportunity to work across various products with the latest tools, techniques and languages such as;

Languages & Frameworks: C#, SQL Server, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (Libraries/Frameworks), ASP.NET MVC, Vue.js.

Platforms: Progressive Web Apps.

Tools: Git (Bitbucket), AWS, TeamCity, Octopus. 

Methodologies: Agile (Scrum, Kanban).

We are looking for a candidate with;

Strong experience in AI/Computer Vision, specifically object detection. 

Hands-on expertise with YOLOv8 (nano variant preferred) for lightweight deployments or equivalent 

Proficiency in ONNX Runtime Web for browser-based inference.  

Solid understanding of model optimization techniques (quantization, pruning).  

Familiarity with JavaScript/TypeScript and Web Assembly for client-side AI execution.  

Experience building edge services in Go, .NET, or C++ for low-latency, real-time systems.

Python experience for training, fine-tuning, and exporting YOLO models prior to deployment.

Infrastructure and deployment experience, particularly with Kubernetes, to support distributed edge services, reliable rollouts, and lifecycle management.

Experience deploying AI models in real-time environments with performance constraints. 

Knowledge of current and emerging web technologies 

Full working rights in Australia.

Why Join Oolio? 

You’ll work closely with a visionary C.T.O and Developers in a high-performance, collaborative team. We offer opportunities to: 

Contribute to critical software solutions 

Work with the latest tools and technologies 

To grow your career and skills across diverse products 

The opportunity to work a hybrid week (3 days in office, 2 days remote)

If this role is of interest to you, please apply via the Seek link with a current resume.
